class.description: A controller for the AR puppeteer app

class.description: A controller that renders Cartesian based tracking of a single panda using toughe controle.

class.description: A controller that renders joint based tracking of a single panda using toughe controle.

class.name: kth_franka_controllers/KthJointVelocityEffortInterfaceController
class.description: A controller that renders joint based tracking of a single panda using toughe controle.
